title: Patch 5.13 Bugs Megathread

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! With every new patch Riot introduces to balance out champions and items there are some unforeseen issues that creep up and...

body:
Hello Everyone,

We are here and waiting to respond to any first day patch issues you may encounter today. If you do encounter any bugs after patching, please post them here for our team to investigate.

Also, you may want to check the reddit megathread linked in this post. Our devs will be scanning that forum and providing updates there as well.

Thank you,
Riot Cochese

**UPDATE - 9:01am AEST **

We will be disabling Zed due to a game play affecting bug. We are working on a fix and I'll update once we know more.

replies.body:
More than late haha. Discovered a bug with Marauder Ashe in a Co op Vs. AI Intro game. She was automatically sent on a course to the enemy Nexus (red side) any time you moved from the fountain and clicking around the minimap or screen wouldn't change her course. The only way to stop was to recall or press S. Her abilities worked fine. I could fire R in any direction and same with E and W. This was rather frustrating.{{item:3070}} 

-Denki

More than late haha. Discovered a bug with Marauder Ashe in a Co op Vs. AI Intro game. She was automatically sent on a course to the enemy Nexus (red side) any time you moved from the fountain and clicking around the minimap or screen wouldn't change her course. The only way to stop was to recall or press S. Her abilities worked fine. I could fire R in any direction and same with E and W. This was rather frustrating.{{item:3070}} 

-Denki

I might be a few days late while posting this, but encountered a bug in ARAM champion select where I couldn't trade my champion with others, or reroll the champion. Someone wanted to trade fiddle for morg, each time they cancelled the request and sent it the little 'swap' arrow would flash then disappear again.

Picture of the champ select (http://i.imgur.com/URyE6Q1.jpg )
